title.rendered: 2022 World Cup Privately Guided Tours & Excursions

content.rendered:
Privately Guided Tours & Excursions in Qatar

We love hosting guests at the biggest sporting events in the world but our job doesn’t stop there. We want our guests to experience the absolute best of every host destination. This is why we’ve hand-picked a number of privately guided tours to complement our 2022 World Cup travel packages. Enhance your personalized itinerary with unique excursions that include dune bashing in the desert, discovering century-old markets, taking an unforgettable hot-air balloon ride, and other must-see attractions.

World Cup Tours & Experiences
Discover Doha – Highlights Tour
Souq Waqif and Katara Village
Visit to Qatar State Grand Mosque and Arabic Coffee Experience
Culture of Doha - National Museum of Qatar and Museum of Islamic Art
Private Shopping Experience
Hot Air Balloon Flight
Culinary Tour in Souq Waqif
Desert Safari – Camel Ride and Dune Bashing
